name: Sava
appearance: River-scarred matriarch with weathered hands, a silvered pole strapped across her back, cropped grey hair, and old rope burns at her wrists.
character: Gruff and protective; the river took much from her, and everything she does now is to keep it from taking more from her crews.
talents: Feels hidden currents through a pole
Can still a dockside riot with a barked order
dreams: Find her first-born lost on the Moonbridge
Secure Ferrymen priority at the Weir forever
secrets: Brokered smuggling under a quarantine pennant once
Keeps a shard of moonmoss to remember a face she fears to forget
